title: Whisky chocolate cake
ingredients: ['4 tablespoons raisins', '4 tablespoons whisky', '200g plain chocolate, chopped', '125g butter', '3 egg yolks', '3 egg whites', '125g caster sugar', '4 1/2 tablespoons cake flour', '110g finely ground almonds', '1 pinch salt', '80g plain chocolate, chopped', '3 tablespoons icing sugar', '3 tablespoons butter']
